subTitle: Discover the amenities of our hotel

text.title: На круговой: hotel in Zaporozhye
text: Some say that finding the perfect hotel is not realistic. You may have to spend a little time before you find one that you like. Hotel 'Na krugovoy' - we can assure you that in combination with the conditions and the price, you won't find us better!

text.title: Hotel location
text: The hotel is located near the center of the city of Zaporozhye, it is very easy to come to us and leave for the airport or train station

There are several supermarkets near us, grocery stores, fast food restaurants, but you also have the opportunity to cook something for yourself in your room - after all, we do everything possible for our customers - everything is for you

text.title: Additional terms
text: We have a luxurious sauna - which will give you the opportunity to relax after a long journey or just have a nice and useful time

text.title: Rent an apartment
text: Also, the hotel on the circular provides several apartments for rent - in the city center.
